name: Help Volty
description:
- Turns your iPad into a series of magical boxes that contain all kinds of electrical and mechanical puzzles.
- Provides hours of gameplay requiring a sharp mind, nimble fingers and quick reflexes.
- Has no menus, popups, tutorials or even text, you are on your own as you find your way through the game.
- No internet connection needed, no ads and no in-app purchases!

Help Volty is a challenging, mysterious puzzler that is enticing to your eyes, ears and fingers.
